s36: Jian Yuan to Yuan Feng year 6: 36 years; Tai Chu year 1 to Hou Yuan year 2: 18 years
s39: As attendant-in-chief followed the uprising at Pei, reached Baxia, made marquis. As general entered Han, as Left Chancellor campaigned against Qi and Wei, as Right Chancellor made Pingyang Marquis, 16,600 households
s40: 7th. Year 6, twelfth month, jia shen day, Yi Marquis Cao Can year 1
s41: 5th. His second year became Chancellor. 2nd. Year 6 tenth month, Jing Marquis Kuai year 1
s43: 19th. 4th. After 4 years, Jian Marquis Ji year 1
s45: 10th. 16th. Yuan Guang year 5, Gong Marquis Xiang year 1. Yuan Ding year 3, current Marquis Zong year 1
s48: As attendant-in-chief followed uprising at Wan and Qu, entered Han, as Cavalry Commandant pacified the Three Qins, attacked Xiang Yu, separately pacified Jiangling, made marquis, 5,300 households. As Cavalry General attacked Qing Bu and Chen Xi
s51: With King Huai of Chu's grandson Xin, attacked Xiang Yu, separately pacified Jiangling, made marquis, 3,000 households
s52: 5th. 2nd. Year 6 ninth month, Yi Marquis Xin year 1
s55: As attendant-in-chief followed uprising at Pei, reached Pengcheng, made marquis. As Cavalry General attacked Xiang Yu at Gaixia, captured him
